name: Paperless-AI
author: clusterzx
description: Paperless-AI is an automated document analyzer for Paperless-ngx that uses AI (OpenAI API, Ollama, DeepSeek, and other compatible services) to automatically analyze and tag your documents. It features automated document management, AI-powered analysis for precise metadata assignment, a manual mode with modern web interface, and an interactive RAG-powered chat functionality to query your documents with AI. It supports multiple AI providers including Ollama, OpenAI, DeepSeek, OpenRouter, Perplexity, Together.ai, VLLM, LiteLLM, Fastchat, and Gemini.

form_fields.label: Paperless-ngx API URL
form_fields.hint: URL of your Paperless-ngx API (e.g., http://localhost:8000/api)

form_fields.label: Paperless-ngx API Token
form_fields.hint: API token from your Paperless-ngx instance (Settings > API)

form_fields.label: Paperless Username
form_fields.hint: Your Paperless-ngx username for document processing

form_fields.label: AI Provider
form_fields.hint: AI service provider (openai, ollama, custom, deepseek, etc.)

form_fields.label: OpenAI API Key
form_fields.hint: Your OpenAI API key (required if using OpenAI provider)

form_fields.label: OpenAI Model
form_fields.hint: OpenAI model to use (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo)

form_fields.label: Ollama API URL
form_fields.hint: URL of your Ollama instance (e.g., http://localhost:11434)

form_fields.label: Ollama Model
form_fields.hint: Ollama model to use (e.g., llama3.2, mistral, phi3)

form_fields.label: Custom API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for custom provider (DeepSeek, OpenRouter, etc.)

form_fields.label: Custom Base URL
form_fields.hint: Base URL for custom AI provider API

form_fields.label: Custom Model
form_fields.hint: Model name for custom provider (e.g., deepseek-chat)

form_fields.label: Document Scan Interval
form_fields.hint: Cron expression for automatic document scanning (e.g., */30 * * * * for every 30 minutes)

form_fields.label: Process Predefined Documents
form_fields.hint: Enable processing of documents with predefined tags

form_fields.label: Processing Tags
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated list of tags for predefined document processing

form_fields.label: Add AI Processed Tag
form_fields.hint: Automatically add a tag to documents processed by AI

form_fields.label: AI Processed Tag Name
form_fields.hint: Name of the tag to add to AI-processed documents

form_fields.label: Use Prompt Tags
form_fields.hint: Use only selected tags for processing (disables prompt dialog)

form_fields.label: Prompt Tags
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated list of tags to use in prompts

form_fields.label: Use Existing Data
form_fields.hint: Use existing correspondents and tags from Paperless-ngx in AI prompts

form_fields.label: RAG Service Enabled
form_fields.hint: Enable RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for document chat functionality

form_fields.label: API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for webhook access (leave empty for auto-generation)

form_fields.label: System Prompt
form_fields.hint: Custom AI system prompt for document analysis (leave empty for default)

form_fields.label: Application Port
form_fields.hint: Port for the Paperless-AI web interface (1024-65535)
